Vim Plug Installation and Configuration
---------------------------------------

-> All of these commands go in your .vimrc file.
.-------------------------------------------------------------------------------.
|                 Install vim-plug if it isn't already installed.               |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|                                                                               |
|       if empty(glob('~/.vim/autoload/plug.vim'))                              |
|         silent !curl -fLo ~/.vim/autoload/plug.vim --create-dirs              |
| 	        \ raw.githubusercontent.com/junegunn/vim-plug/master/plug.vim       |
|       endif                                                                   |
|                                                                               |
'-------------------------------------------------------------------------------'
.-------------------------------------------------------------------------------.
|       Automatically install/uninstall missing plugins when starting VIM       |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|                                                                               |
| autocmd VimEnter * if len(filter(values(g:plugs), '!isdirectory(v:val.dir)')) |
|		 \| PlugInstall --sync | source $MYVIMRC                                    |
|	 \| endif                                                                     |
|                                                                               |
'-------------------------------------------------------------------------------'
-> Initialize plugins with 'Plug' followed by the plugin link between the following tags:

    call plug#begin('!/.vim/plugged')
    Plug 'Put the plugin's github repo here'
    call plug#end()
